---
category: news
title: "Microsoft Releases AI Training Library ZeRO-3 Offload"
excerpt: "Microsoft recently open-sourced ZeRO-3 Offload, an extension of their DeepSpeed AI training library that improves memory efficiency while training very large deep-learning models. ZeRO-3 Offload allows users to train models with up to 40 billion parameters on a single GPU and over 2 trillion parameters on 512 GPUs."
publishedDateTime: 2021-04-13T13:04:00Z
